channel.title: [HELP] My Server Launchs A Java Run Thingy
channel.description:
Hi, When I Run My Server It Goes From A .Bat File to When Its Running To A Java Program Thats Running Instead Of A .Bat File...
How Do I Fix This So My Restarter Will Work?

item.title: [HELP] My Server Launchs A Java Run Thingy
item.dc:creator: @GDXChris GDXChris
item.description:
@GDXChris wrote:

  1. What server base are you using?

  2. When you say it is a java application, are you referring to a server manager?

  3. If your source has it in there (probably does), look for ‘Voule Auto Restarter’. It is an exe file.

Read full topic
item.source: [HELP] My Server Launchs A Java Run Thingy
